name: depmole
description: A CLI tool to inspect, analyze, and manage dependencies in your Node.js projects.
author: Isaac Anasonye

scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && node dist/cli.js --help npm pack --dry-run
scripts.release:test: npm run build && node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const name=require('./package.json').name; const version=require('./package.json').version; const file=`${name}-${version}.tgz`; execSync('npm pack', { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync(`npm install -g ${file}`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync('dm --help', { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync('npm uninstall -g ${name}-${version}', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
